title: GM help! I can't buy tier2 rune
body: I already own all the tier3 rune. I try to collect all the tier2 rune but I can only buy 16 of them. After that the system show me "you are not attempted to buy more". How to fix it? I don't want to see that I have some tier2 rune in my rune page unless I can fully collect all of them.

replies.body:
Hey there,

WOW! you own ALL the tier 3 runes?

Sounds to me like you've managed to hit the cap on the amount of runes you can own total. (Which is around 720)
Owning all the tier 3 runes amounts to 684.

The only way to fix this would be to have Player Support remove runes from your account, but then you wouldn't own all of them anymore :(

Sorry about that.
